categoryName: Gift Ideas from Full Belly Fare (Portland Only)
categoryBlurb: Full Belly Fare, is the Portland personal chef with a twist, is a fully licensed, insured, and registered business, in compliance with all food handling, packaging, and labeling laws. Any of these packages make a great gift to give together - especially to new parents with a newborn baby.  All meals are prepared in a certified commercial commissary kitchen in Portland, Oregon. Give a gift together to give a month of meals to the new parents!
